name: CreepyAudio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: creepy audio
des:
This skill plays 90 minutes of creepy instrumental music, perfect for Halloween or other spooky engagements. After you say "start the music", Alexa will play through the tracks in the playlist. "stop" will end your session, but Alexa will remember where you left off the next time you start the skill.

The playlist currently consists of two albums licensed through Creative Commons: Post Mortem Photograph's self-titled album (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Post_Mortem_Photographs/Post_Mortem_Photographs/) and Subterrestrial's Dead but Dreaming (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Subterrestrial/Dead_But_Dreaming/).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
